name: The Cows Are Watching
description: Did you ever wondered about the rumors of cow tipping? Now it´s your turn! Use the darkness and silence of the night to enter the meadows and tipp as much cows as needed to enter the next level.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo / AMD® Athlon™ X2, min. 2.8 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia® / AMD® with 512 MB memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX® 10 compatibl
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Quad / AMD® Phenom™ X4, min. 3,4 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia® / AMD® with 1024 MB memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX® 10 compatible
